segments.text: I see the boy grinning as he reaches into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's on that stool, but he looks like he's having fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below is excited, arm stretched up for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being sneaky, which adds to the thrill for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman by the sink is busy, giving them cover.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's running over, but it hasn't ruined their moment yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen feels alive with their little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window makes it all seem cheerful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even with the overflow, their cookie heist is adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their innocent mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view adds a nice, sunny backdrop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's moments like this that make family life charming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hope they get their treats before anything goes wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
